General.Name: Elixxer Ltd
General.Description: Elixxer Ltd. operates as a cannabis investment firm in Canada, Australia, Italy, Jamaica, and Switzerland. It invests in cultivation, production, and/or sale of medical cannabis and cannabis-derived products in the pharmaceutical sector. The company was formerly known as LGC Capital Ltd. and changed its name to Elixxer Ltd. in August 2019. Elixxer Ltd. was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Montreal, Canada.
General.Address: 100 Boulevard Rene- Levesque Ouest, Montreal, QC, Canada, H5B 4N4
